b.title: The pet tag that does more.
b.description: Scan My Paws tags are the only pet tags that provide instant access to your pet's medical records, contact information, and more. All you need is a smartphone!
b.whyScanMyPawsTitle: Why do pet parents love Scan My Paws?
b.whyScanMyPawsDescription: Scan My Paws tags are the only pet tags that provide instant access to your pet's medical records, contact information, and more. All you need is a smartphone!
b.instantAccessDescription: Scan My Paws tags are the only pet tags that provide instant access to your pet's medical records, contact information, and more. All you need is a smartphone!
b.easyUpdatesDescription: Keep your pet's profile up-to-date with their latest medical records, your current contact information, and more, all from your phone.
b.shareProfileTitle: Share your pet's profile with anyone
b.shareProfileDescription: Share your pet's profile with anyone who might need it, like a pet sitter, dog walker, or veterinarian.
b.donationTitle: For every tag sold, we donate to animal rescue organizations
b.donationDescription: Every time you buy a Scan My Paws tag, you're helping animals in need. We donate a portion of our proceeds to animal rescue organizations.
